alert.note: Alert for Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 3:58PM MDT until July 23 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Oglala Lakota County in southwestern South Dakota... * Until 500 PM MDT. * At 358 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Intersection of Red Shirt and Cuny Table Roads, or 30 miles east of Hot Springs, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Dry Wood Housing around 415 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Goose Neck Housing and Manderson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
